Name: "Ladle of the Leisurely Sea-Beast"
Desc: A soup ladle gifted to you by Neuvillette during Lantern Rite. Its creation by his own hand was a product of a "spontaneous decision" during his "spontaneous outing" and thus holds exceptional meaning. However, perhaps because the Iudex was on vacation at that time, this fantastical sea creature-inspired soup ladle gives off a sense of leisure.\nIf this ladle is used to taste various waters, you might perhaps gain insights you would not normally...
